page.title: 08Highlights of the Year
page.content: The first hightlight of the year for me is New Year's day. New Year is a fresh calendar year starting on Jan. 1st.We don't do any first footing because we have a nice dinner but at night it is even better because I get to see most of my relations that live in Caithness.Another highlight is the summer fete.It is good because there are games,raffles,horse rides and lots of fun.Then in July come the summer holidays,usually lasting six weeks.I can help on the croft,play football, cycle,explore the countryside and go to the playing fields with my friends. At the end of Oct. is Hallowe'en when we go to each house telling funny stories and jokes and in return get sweets,toffee apples,crisps and money. Xmas is the last highlight. I get lots of presents and go to parties at school and in the village hall.
